Content:: Octreotate or octreotide acid is a somatostatin analogue that is closely related to octreotide. Its amino acid sequence is H-D-Phe-Cys-Phe-D-Trp-Lys-Thr-Cys-Thr-OH while octreotide has the terminal threonine reduced to the corresponding amino alcohol.  This hormonal preparation article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: Octreotate - Wikipedia
